mapper.select: WITH latest_token_quotes AS ( SELECT DISTINCT ON (token_id) token_id, closing_price FROM token_quotes WHERE unit = '1m' ORDER BY token_id, created_at DESC ) SELECT w.wallet_id AS walletId, w.user_id AS userId, w.bank_name AS bankName, w.account_no AS accountNo, w.cash_balance AS cashBalance, COALESCE(SUM(h.token_balance * h.purchased_value), 0) AS totalPurchasedValue, COALESCE(SUM(h.token_balance * ltq.closing_price), 0) AS totalMarketValue, w.cash_balance + COALESCE(SUM(h.token_balance * ltq.closing_price), 0) AS totalBalance, COALESCE(SUM(h.token_balance * ltq.closing_price), 0) - COALESCE(SUM(h.token_balance * h.purchased_value), 0) AS profitLoss, CASE WHEN COALESCE(SUM(h.token_balance * h.purchased_value), 0) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE (COALESCE(SUM(h.token_balance * ltq.closing_price), 0) - COALESCE(SUM(h.token_balance * h.purchased_value), 0)) / COALESCE(SUM(h.token_balance * h.purchased_value), 0) * 100 END AS profitLossRate FROM wallets w LEFT JOIN holdings h ON w.wallet_id = h.wallet_id LEFT JOIN latest_token_quotes ltq ON h.token_id = ltq.token_id WHERE w.wallet_id = #{walletId} GROUP BY w.wallet_id, w.user_id, w.bank_name, w.account_no, w.cash_balance;
